korean: 두 달 동안 준비한 프로젝트가 드디어 성공적으로 마무리됐다.
마지막 주에는 거의 매일 야근했는데 오늘 최종 발표가 끝났어.
팀장님이 회식 자리를 마련해주셔서 다 같이 고기를 먹으러 갔다.
회사 법인카드로 쏘신다고 해서 다들 신나했어.
이런 성취감 때문에 일하는 건가 싶다.
2차로 카페 가서 디저트 먹으면서 프로젝트 회고했어.
다음 프로젝트 때는 뭘 개선하면 좋을지도 얘기 나눴다.
집에 가는 길에 진짜 뿌듯하고 행복했다.
english: The project we've been working on for two months finally wrapped up successfully.
We worked overtime almost every day last week, but today the final presentation finished.
Our team leader treated us to dinner, so we all went out for Korean BBQ.
They said it was on the company card, so everyone was super excited.
It was tough, but seeing the good results made it all worthwhile.
The client was satisfied and the higher-ups praised us too.
We toasted with the team and encouraged each other saying we all worked hard.
We laughed talking about all the tough moments we went through.
I guess this sense of accomplishment is why I keep doing this.
For round two, we went to a cafe and had dessert while doing a project retrospective.
We talked about what we could improve for the next project.
On my way home, I felt really proud and happy.
